#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct coord{
	int x,y;
};
int det(int a,int b,int c,int d)
{
	return abs((a*d)-(c*b));
}
int main()
{
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int i;
	coord pt[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>pt[i].x>>pt[i].y;
	double sum=0;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		int pti=(i)%n;
		int pti1=(i+1)%n;
		sum=sum+det(pt[pti].x,pt[pti].y,pt[pti1].x,pt[pti1].y);
	}
	sum=sum/2.0;
	cout<<setiosflags(ios::fixed | ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(1)<<sum<<endl;
}
	return 0;
}
